entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
